channel.title: Bit of help with compiler
channel.description: When i compile it says i need jdk 6.0, any idea where i can get it from, a link would be great ;)

item.title: Bit of help with compiler
item.dc:creator: @awesom awesom
item.description:
@awesom wrote:

rofl thats a shit compiler and he didn’t ask for compiler he asked for JDK www.google.com JDK 6.0 and find the link yourself…

Read full topic

item.title: Bit of help with compiler
item.dc:creator: @moneybags123 moneybags123
item.description:
@moneybags123 wrote:

use this

@echo off title Compiler Color 0a echo Awesome Compiler made by dragonus18 echo note: only compatible with jdk 6u2 echo. echo type c to compile echo type r to run echo. set /p option=Option: if %option%==c goto compile if %option%==r goto run pause :compile cls color 0c "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac" -cp . *.java pause exit :run cls color 0c java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

Read full topic
